Manager Response: Dear KWong55,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of our hotel during your recent stay.  Although it was brief, I'm happy that you enjoyed the amenities and service that we provide. We hope you can stay with us again for a longer visit and enjoy the other facilities that you did not get to experience.  Best Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Great clean and updated hotel, right off the freeway, easy to access, quiet room. Starbucks in the same parking lot is very handy in the morning. Rooms are very clean and up to date. I really like the toll road, traffic is non existent, and makes for a quick trip.
Manager Response: Dear Ward N,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  We take great pride in the service and product that we provide our guests, and I'm happy to hear that you really enjoyed it!  We look forward to being of service to you again during your next visit!  Warm Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Used my Marriott Rewards for a one night stay at this lovely location.  This hotel located off the toll road, is situated near many restaurants and gyms.  The hotel is a newer courtyard, quiet and very comfortable.  I used the mobile check-in for early arrival and my room was waiting upon my arrival.  It's a lively hotel and I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Allan K,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay at our hotel.  We take great pride in the service and product that we provide our guests, and I'm happy to hear that you experienced that!  We look forward to having you get away with us again in the future!  Warm Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: We were only in the hotel for one night however it was very comfortable, affordable and had modern decor and furnishings. The beds were super comfortable and shower pressure was just right.  The staff was genuinely friendly and helpful. We had a few drinks at the bar before heading out for the night and was surprised by the selection of drinks available. I had a spicy margarita that was delicious and the server even offered to make me something different if I didn't like it.  We needed an uber for our night out and found one easily in the neighborhood.  Overall a great experience that I'd definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear SDmommy76,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience of our hotel.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the comforts of the room and the service of our associates. We hope to be of service to you again during your next visit to the Foothill Ranch area...and thank you in advance for the recommendations to your family and friends!  Warm Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Overall, a nice property. I got a good rate. Rooms were clean. Blackout curtains were awesome. Amenities included in-room coffee, decent shampoo and conditioner. My room had a working TV and refrigerator. However, my brother's room was missing the refrigerator and the TV did not work properly. Had my brother's room not had these problems I would have given the property a rating of 4 instead of 3. Desk staff was polite. They offered to comp him a breakfast for the inconvenience.  We did not use the pool, however another family told us that it was heated. There is a small restaurant on the property, again we did not use this feature.  Surrounding area allows good access to restaurants and shopping. There is a Round Table Pizza and a Thai restaurant in the same complex. Within a
Manager Response: Dear Maikai_hoaloha,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at our hotel. In our location, we are conveniently located next to the 241 toll road.  Our area has transitioned to online payments for all drivers on our local toll roads.  But we are also only a few miles away from the 5 and 405 freeways, which do not require additional funds to drive.  If you do decide to visit us in the future, please be sure to speak with any of our Guest Service Representatives and they can assist you with driving directions.  Thank you for your wonderful comments about our newly renovated rooms and we look forward to serving you again the future!  Regards, Cailin Cooksy Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean hotel far from the rest of OC
Summary: The hotel is a nice place, clean with a nice pool. Toll roads are pretty much required to get out, and there aren't a ton of food options nearby.  But the rooms are pretty big, the place is nice and clean, and you can buy expensive snacks in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear mehudson1,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback allows us to find ways to improve that I will be able to share with my team.  Warm Regards,  Cailin Cooksy Operations Manager

Summary Heading: The courtyard is beautiful, updated & very helpful staff. The business center allowed me to get work done. Updated rooms
Summary: Updated rooms are beautiful and very clean. Staff is friendly & helpful. Business center is great. The bristo has great food. Check in was fast and easy. The balcony rooms are overlooking the pool, gorgeous!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good hotel for business travelers.  I stayed in this hotel in October 2016 and found it very clean, the staff was nice and the WIFI was adequate.  The location is great - close to restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Dirty and rude: avoid if you can!
Summary: Staying two weeks per month in a dirty hotel should be enough... but if it is very next to the office you can force yourself. But if you are hungry and "the Bistro" (what a wasted French name for using the microwave!!!) should be open looking at the timetable... but emplyee is too lazy and rude for preparing a salad... it is time to change.
Manager Response: Dear colandre73,  I am deeply sorry for the experience you had at our hotel.  The staff is typically great about delivering Marriott service, and our housekeeping staff usually exceeds our cleanliness standards considering they take pride in our newly renovated our rooms.  Apparently, we failed to deliver that experience to you.  Please contact me at your earliest convenience, as I'd appreciate getting more specific information to be able to correct these issues.  I want to make it right!  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary Heading: Too expensive for what I got
Summary: I use to sleep here when I'm on a business trip around here. They charge me 130$ per night for having an average room with a small neon light bathroom and a long but narrow double queen side bed.  There's no other view than factories and a toll road.  I would definitely pick something else if it was not so close to where I work at.
Manager Response: Dear Nicola Z,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at our hotel.  I'm sorry that you feel that the prices are expensive, but I can guarantee you that we are competitively priced with all the other major hotel brands in the area. We have newly renovated rooms that are decorated with modern-style amenities, and our new queen and king size beds are standard sizes with hotels here in the US. I hope you will reconsider going to a different hotel when visiting Foothill Ranch.  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable hotel close to the office
Summary: I have stayed at this particular Courtyard many times and it never disappoints. Rooms are large and well maintained, gym equipment works fine though space is limited. The spa pool is always at the perfect temperature for a post workout stretch. Breakfast has improved a lot since I was here a few months back with the egg white scramble superb. Staff are polite and professional.
Manager Response: Dear jimmyhendriks,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about your recent stay at our hotel.  I am happy that you found our product to be sufficient for your needs and our service to be efficient for your business needs. We look forward to being of service to you again when you're in the Foothill Ranch area.  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Good location for our 100 mile Amtrak bike ride from Irvine to San Diego. Plenty roomy enough for 2 riders and their 2 bikes! Stayed at many Courtyards, first time at this one. Would definitely stay again. Right off the 241, Sbux and a couple other restaurants in the plaza, plus several more options just down the street. Got well rested at this Courtyard, then a successful pedal down the coast to another one the next night in San Diego!
Manager Response: Dear shortchick,  Thank you for taking the time to write about our hotel.  I'm happy that you were able to rest and be ready for your century mile ride.   We look forward to being of service to you again soon!  Warm Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary Heading: Stay when attending Saddleback Church Events
Summary: This was the third year in a row that we stayed at this hotel next to Saddleback Church.  I was very happy that the desk was able to accommodate my first floor room request since I hurt my knee a week prior to staying here.  The hotel also put in a Starbucks Coffee in the lobby this year! The room is just right for my wife and I.  The bathroom was very clean and it had a beautiful counter and shower tub.  The small couch was very comfortable to sit and watch the Olympics on.  Very quick access to Saddleback Church, you could easily walk over if you want to.
Manager Response: Dear Jasbo55,  Thank you for sharing your experience about our hotel.  I am happy that you enjoyed the new rooms and our staff took great care of you.  We look forward to being of service to you again on your next visit to Saddleback Church.  Warm Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: The hotel is beautiful however the room we reserved and booked was not available to us.  We had 4 adults booked in a double queen room and we were given a single King bed for all four of us.  The staff would absolutely not give us the room we booked and it wasn't until after we begged the manager to give us our room that the staff finally conceded.  We were told by the front desk staff member that because we had a silver member reward card that we would get free internet and once we got back home found a charge on my credit card for $24.75 for internet charges.  When I called to ask about the charges I was told only gold and platinum members get free internet.  I'm very disappointed that the staff was not knowledgeable of policy and misinformed us.
Manager Response: Dear newlifers,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about our hotel.  I am sorry that my staff did not take care of your requests and misinformed you about the internet. Please call me directly at the hotel so I can look up your folio receipt and give you a credit back of $24.75 for those internet charges.  I can assure you that we will be bringing this to the team's attention for training purposes so that it does not happen again. I look forward to hearing from you...  Warm Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: We were very comfortable, front desk upgraded our room when we arrived late and tired.  Easy drive to Laguna beach without paying beach prices.  Highly recommend as clean, comfy, safe and friendly!  We also enjoyed the pool and spa.  Many good restaurants nearby!
Manager Response: Dear Hansen5,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about our hotel.  We are very happy that you enjoyed the service, amenities and location of the property. We hope to be of service to you again!  Warm Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel to make a stop on our way to LA, we had a nice surprise... Hotel looks new or recently renovated, check in was quick, staff is nice. Rooms are big and comfortable. Clean . Had breakfast included on our rate. You can choose from many options on the cafe, and they were good, Many restaurants on the site,all walking distance. Had dinner on a Thai and it was so good!
Manager Response: Dear karla014,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about our hotel.  I am happy that you were pleasantly surprised with the hotel's facilities and service provided.  We look forward to being of service to you again during your next visit to the area!  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: This Courtyard is very similar to the Riverside UCR hotel. Nice lobby, nice rooms, a grill instead of the free continental breakfast that serves breakfast and lunch along with alcohol. Good location for business visitors in the Foothill Ranch area with excellent access to the 241 Toll Road.
Manager Response: Dear Rick C,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at our hotel.  I'm glad you enjoyed our lobby, rooms, and location. We look forward to servicing you again in the future!  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Super clean and spacious room, super comfy bed, great hot shower with good water pressure. Above average friendly staff and delicious coffee and breakfast. The hotel and staff were so kind and accommodating to our motorcycle crew. We enjoyed it so much we stayed an extra night!
Manager Response: Dear Amy H,  Thank you for feedback about our hotel.  I'm happy that you enjoyed our facilities and amenities offered.  We look forward to you coming again next year for the Born Free event.  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Stayed there for 2 night last week and had a great time for a family wedding.  Took advantage of the workout center, pool and lobby for big family gatherings.  The common areas were really nice and the staff were helpful with everything we needed.  Room was renovated and suited all our needs. We had a king room with a pull out single couch.  Perfect for our family of 3.  Desk chair was also very comfy and there was free wifi for marriott rewards people..sign up if you haven't already.    Free parking and within 5 minutes of target, dennys, chickfila and other fast food.      If you go for a run, find the trail off the main entrance of Portola.  There was tons of trails that have you weaving around and hanging with local and the tourists decked out in full hiking gear.
Manager Response: Dear nickiwms,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel.  I'm happy that you found our room and other amenities perfect for your stay.  We look forward to being of service to you again in the future.  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Only stayed for 2 nights for a long weekend. Really enjoyed my stay and would stay again. I regretted the fact that I did not have time to enjoy the trail system or pool. Service was fast and efficient and everyone was nice.  Pros: Quiet location Free parking and free wifi Newer property, nicely furnished and decorated Non-smoking property, windows could open for air Couch in the room! Free lemonade, a nice touch. Wished they had free coffee too. great setup for you to use computers  Cons: Wished I had more than 1 coffee packet for the single serving coffeemaker Lighting near hallway was "automated" so it would go on/off as you approach. Not a good idea if one person needed to go to the bathroom while someone else is sleeping Kind of in the middle of a business park. A little
Manager Response: Dear SunnyDTraveler,  Thank you for taking the time to share your favorable feedback about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are happy that you enjoyed the newly renovated room and the service from our team.  We hope your next visit allows more time to enjoy the nearby trails and other facilities of the hotel.  Warm Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Were welcomed to hotel, nicely setup.  Had a large comfortable bed and clean bathroom. No real problem except Ice machine was down. Large tv and wifi in room worked well. Easy parking.   Some local places to eat within walking distance   Quiet night. Would come back
Manager Response: Dear Perkadventures,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are aware of the ice machine and got them fixed immediately.  I'm delighted you enjoyed the location and amenities the hotel offers.  We look forward to having you back!  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary Heading: Quiet, clean, with great trails nearby for runners and hikers
Summary: I found this property great. First off, it is newer, clean, quiet and a friendly staff.  The location was good for a business trip for me, but the bonus was a trail system just a block from the front door. The trails are wide, well cared for, quiet and challenging. I was on them as soon as the sun arose and barely saw a soul, but by the end a few mountain bikers , runners and walkers were arriving.
Manager Response: Hello wjoiner,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel.  I'm glad you enjoyed the property and the surrounding trails during your trip. We look forward to having you stay with us again!  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Not knowing the area, I found it on a whim.  Since Rancho Santa Margarita is a more high-end housing area, I drove for more than a few miles around the church where I was to attend a memorial service looking for a place to stay.  There it was, a grand hotel perched on a hill and waiting for me.  Upon arrival, I was greeted warmly, even without a reservation.  Check-in was easy; instantly I was entering a very clean, upgraded room.  All the amenities were present for a very comfortable stay.  I really appreciated the calm lobby with a fireplace and a fully stocked cafeteria, including Starbuck's coffee!  I didn't need to leave the hotel to eat a healthy dinner and breakfast.  It was the perfect last minute oasis.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great room at a great price!
Summary: Bed was super comfy and the balcony was worth it to enjoy my morning coffee. The couch was also comfy and cute. Staff was extremely friendly and the room was clean and with great lighting to get ready. It also was nearby to everything which is great.
Manager Response: Hello Rebecca A,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel.  I'm happy to see that you enjoyed our amenities and found everything to your liking.  We look forward to having you back!  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Relaxing and secluded location ideal for getting away from city bustle. The room was clean and comfy with a small fridge and had a nice view of the local hills. Hall carpeting could use a rebuff but still clean. Liked the little bar and private seating, but most of all the chimney. Close to freeway. Only annoying part was people smoking by the pool area and near front door; cigarette smoke doesn't know it's supposed to stay outside and travels inside.
Manager Response: Dear David B,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us and the comments about how we can make your stay better.  It's feedback like yours that allow us to improve each day for future guests.  We hope to be of service to you again soon!  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: I stayed here with family for 1 night. Rooms are good as usual for Marriott. I liked the ambience. We had a breakfast and evening snack there. Liked the quality of food. They should have better menu selection - but there are ample restaurants in the next block - so not a hassle. Service could have been better - specially stone faced reception with no knowledge of customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Prashant M,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at our hotel.  We value your comments, especially what we can do to improve.  I will be sure to share your comments with my front desk team, especially if we are giving the "stone cold" impression.  Thank you,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Lake Forest, California definitely isn't a tourist destination but if you're there on business (like I frequently am) the Courtyard Mariott is a good choice.  I was there for 3 nights on business. Here are some pros and cons I noticed during my stay.  PROS -free WiFi -friendly staff -nice bar/restaurant area -decent sized rooms that are comfortable -smaller gym but had everything I needed (treadmill) -have an outdoor pool (although, I didn't use it) -good business meeting rooms -snack bar at front desk for late night snacks  CONS -not much walking distance in the area. Just a small appie bar and a fast food restaurant
Manager Response: Dear Nick N,  Thank you for sharing your pros and cons about our hotel!  We are happy that you experienced more pros than cons.  Your time and feedback to let us know is truly appreciated.  We look forward to being of service to you again during your next visit(s) to Foothill Ranch!  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Not bad but really nothing to brag about. The rooms were clean and the staff was friendly but a lot of minor details were annoying. When checking in the TV didn't work and the shower was very difficult to get to a comfortable temperature, it varied between too cold to too hot. I'm a Marriott Gold member and this is the only Marriott hotel I stayed in there I didn't get the usual extra benefits like room upgrade, free breakfast etc.
Manager Response: Dear matsmd,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about your recent stay at our hotel.  It is feedback like yours that allow us to improve our product and service for all our guests.  I will be sure to share this with my entire team.  We hope you will consider staying with us again during your next visit to Foothill Ranch.  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: 12 year old property, 4 stories, U-shaped, directly off highway, 15 minutes from SNA airport. Very good condition, clean/comfortable with a refresh scheduled for this year.  The property is by no means out of shape, very commendable that they plan on keeping it fresh.  There are a few restaurants within walking distance (including a Starbucks), plethora of choices within 15 minutes. If you're into Fitness, there is a LA Fitness about a mile away ($15 for a day pass). My suite had two LCD TVs, fridge, no microwave.  Internet (free) speed very good. As in all Courtyard properties, there is no free breakfast.  Bistro restaurant offers pre-made meals at decent prices.
Manager Response: Dear edtoby007,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with the TripAdvisor community and giving us a favorable review.  We are excited about our upcoming renovation and look forward to our guests experiencing the new product.  We look forward to being of service to you again during your next visit to Foothill Ranch!  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, clean and comfortable with some nice amenities
Summary: I stayed here for a couple of days of training for my company and stayed here as it is only a block from my company headquarters.  I was impressed by the rooms- both the size and comfort.  The amenities this hotel offers are nice as well.  There is a good bar/ coffee shop in the lobby and a little store for items you may have forgotten.  There is not a lot to do in the area surrounding this hotel as it is part of a business park.
Manager Response: Dear Rehsinup19,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We truly appreciate the favorable comments...We look forward to being of service to you again in the future.  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: Checked in here with my family after a long day of driving. We wanted to rest rest a little at the hotel and asked the front desk guy, Kevin, for recommendations for some Chinese food. He had no recommendations so we took a chance and called the nearest place. He ended up asking us how the food was and we told him at no fault to his own that it was bad. Minutes after we got back into our room we got a knock from room service giving us a bag of delicious ice cream, brownies and cookies from Kevin apologizing for the bad Chinese food! We were in shock of how generous he was to do this. This place exceeded our expectations for a standard Courtyard and would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I visited this particular Courtyard by Marriott with two local friends on Sat night December 19, 2015 on a AT&T Employee weekend rate negotiated with Marriott. This was my first stay at this location, which is growing with new homes sprouting in all directions (I remembered driving by this area many years ago, and it was all rural country - the urban growth is simply mind boggling!) We were greeted nicely and received Room 337 (King Sized Bed with Sofa Bed) with view of a rainy pool and spa area (Due to the heavy rain and winds, I decided not to visit the pool area). The room was nice, with plenty of pillows!!! My friends and 'yours truly' enjoyed sleeping in late, and got my customary 1pm late checkout. FIVE CLAWS UP!!!!! Gay Friendly. Thanks and 'Merry Christmas'!!! Joe G. Bear
Manager Response: Dear goriajk,  Thank you for the FIVE CLAWS UP!  I am happy that you had a good experience at our hotel, and thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  We hope to be of service to you and your friends again in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: I have been in this nice hotel during a business trip for a week. Surroundings are not interesting, anyway the hotel is decent, it has a small fitness center and an open pool. I appreciated the stay and also all the hotel personnel was very kind. Wi-fi in the rooms is free, reliable and fast enough. Unfortunately there is no breakfast, but a small cafe inside the main lobby where you can order simple meals of good quality. Anyway recommended if you need to stay around here.
Manager Response: Dear Mararti,  Thank you for your favorable review and feedback.  We hope your business trip was productive during your week stay.  We hope to be of service to you again in the near future!  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: This place used to be on the top of my list due to the excellent and friendly staff from the management to the individuals cleaning the rooms.  There has been significant turnover as of late making this go from a not too bad place to go if you must be away from home to an average, if that, hotel.  The only saving grace continues to be the Bistro staff.
Manager Response: Dear Tara K,  Thank you for your feedback.  As much as we would have loved to keep the old front desk team, it would've not been fair to them if we did not let them grow with the company at other hotels or pursue their personal dreams outside of the industry.  I can assure you that, the team that we have now, is fully trained with the Marriott Spirit to Serve and Courtyard brand standards...just like the previous team.  Please give us, including myself, some time to get accustomed to all of our regular guests and their individual preferences during their stay.  Please know that we truly appreciate you and your loyalty to our hotel.  Regards,  Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: I've stayed here several times before. It's a standard hotel with pleasant staff and clean accommodations.  The room I had this time was tired. The vanity in the bathroom had been repaired/rehung and it was not level, and not level by a lot.  Toiletries literally rolled off. The carpet in the hallway was loose and presented a trip hazard.   My main complaint however is that I asked the front desk to arrange a taxi to the airport for me. I confirmed it with the front desk a bit before and when they arrived it was a car service. And they charge a flat rate at $20+ more than the taxi fare I paid coming in.  It's a Saturday morning. No way is the taxi going to be even close to the flat rate. The driver says "it's a brand new car". Which is why I asked for a taxi and not a car
Manager Response: Dear {0},  Thank you for your time in expressing your concerns.  I can assure you that this will be addressed with the front desk team and resolved immediately.   During your next visit, please ask for me at the front desk.  I would like to personally thank you and take care of your next cab fare to the airport.  Regards, Art Aquino General Manager

Summary: This hotel didn't wow us, but it had the essentials mostly well done.  I gave it a 4 because it was clean, had a good bed and it was quiet. On the con's side, they had no tea in the room, no free breakfast and their housekeeping performance was a bit erratic (spotty resupply of items) although the room was always left clean.  Also, the desk space was odd and not ergonomically suitable at all, because the "desk" was a rolling pullout that was too high for this person to type on my computer given how low was the uppermost setting for the accompanying chair.  To our surprise, they also couldn't manage to get us a second luggage stand for the entire 9 nights we were there. On the pro's side, the in-room decaf coffee was simply the best I've ever had, the bathroom was decent, the bed
Manager Response: Dear kooikermom,  Thank you for taking the time to share your Pros and Cons about your experience at our hotel.  We value the Pros, as it let's us know what we need to continue being consistent with.  The Cons allow us to improve and become a better hotel.  Your feedback is truly appreciated!

Summary: I stayed there for a weekend visiting family in the area. Its Marriott Courtyard and you get what you expect: clean room, comfortable bed, more than enough parking space, and a starbucks plus a breakfast venue across the parking area north.
Manager Response: Dear Hassan S,  Thank you for sharing your favorable review.  We hope to be of service to you again in the future!

Summary: Rooms are clean and comfy.   Provide good shampoo and conditioner,beds are big and comfortable.   Really have to say love the bar tender such a nice guy!  It's nice to be able to unwind and have a nice conversation.    The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Mehavasu,  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback...We appreciate the favorable review!

Summary: At first glance this seems like a really nice hotel.  Lobby was spacious and had lots of seating for socializing.  Nice area set aide to do business.  It had a cafe inside with seating for eating,  Nice and friendly staff .Very Nice!  On to the rooms.  This is where things were not so impressive.  Nice and clean but seemed dated.  Room very close to toll road, so traffic noise could be heard regularly.  Bed had a basic mattress that was uncomfortable and it had a small raised area going down the middle, Office chair would not stay up.  Very small cooler type refrigerator that had no temp. setting and didn't keep food/drinks very cold.  No microwave.  I have stayed in more comfortable updated rooms for less money.  There was also no type of complimentary breakfast of any kind.  I
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great service. Hotel was clean and contemporary. It's in a business park next to a variety of small restaurants including Starbucks and less than a mile away for a larger shopping center with more restaurants and a movie theater. While next to SR241(toll road), it is about 10 miles from I-5 if you take El Torro Road. We purchased the breakfast package when we booked. It was worth every dollar. Great tasting breakfast!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is at one end of a parking lot with several businesses, including some very good restaurants (Urban Grill, Thai Garden, etc.) that are within easy walking distance.  The rooms are decent, with a small refrigerator and an uncomfortable pull-out couch.  My room overlooked a busy highway.  There's a nice sized TV about 8 feet from the bed.  Mediocre water pressure.  Check-in was quick and friendly.  As with a growing number of Courtyards, they're too cheap to provide complementary lobby coffee, but instead charge you $2.50 for a cup of Starbucks.  Go a block away and stay at the Hampton.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your reveiw.  We appreciate your feedback and have shared your comments with the pertaining departments, such as the water pressure with our engineering team....  As far as the complimentary coffee, you are correct we do not offer coffee in the lobby, but we do have a fantastic coffee that can be brewed in each room during your stay here.  We hope we see you again in the future and please do not hesitate to reach out to me if you have any questions.  Thank you!

Summary: Each time I have stayed here I have been impressed with the feeling of "spaciousness." It is very open. The counter staff is always helpful and professional. They have a small convenience store and a large meeting area for socializing and even offers cocktails in the evening. The morning breakfast is ample and tasty! You will enjoy your stay here!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This place has grown on me
Summary: I have stayed at this property before.  While the rooms are in need of a renovation, the staff is wonderful.  The bistro has a nice assortment of breakfast items. The workout facilities are good and the location is near the highway and shopping area.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: One of the nicest rooms/beds for comfortable and quiet rest we have used.  Drawback is we prefer hotels with quick complimentary breakfast.  Found this has great little restaurant but more time-consuming and, of course, added cost.  Upscale business no-nonsense clientele (not the typical SoCal "family" type), tho sure families are welcome.  We've stayed a number of times and rooms never disappoint even when going thru remodeling a couple years ago.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Courtyard is a solid hotel for business travel. The staff is very courteous and helpful. The location is great! There are hiking trails accessible from the parking lot. Also in the parking lot many good options for food.
Manager Response: Tams,  Thank you for your review! We love that we are conveniently located to so much out here in Foothill Ranch, and we are happy you got to take advantage of those things. We look forward to your return visit!

Summary: We had 3 rooms at the hotel last weekend for a wedding event in the area.  The hotel staff were all welcoming and efficient in getting us registered.  Our rooms were nice, very clean and comfortable.  We got back to the hotel late in the evening and although there are a couple of restaurants within walking distance we decided to order at the bistro in the lobby.  The waiter was very friendly and the food was quite good!  I have stayed at this hotel in the past and will certainly do so again!  It's easy to get to and if you use the 241 toll road, you can go online within 5 days to pay your toll.  If you are traveling during busy rush hours, the toll road is a great alternative to sitting in traffic.
Manager Response: HappyGirlAdventurer,  We love Marriott travelers! Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your latest wedding event in the area. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time here, and can't wait to see you again!

Summary: I really liked staying at this hotel....everything about it is nice! My room was very nice, large and all the amenities were great!  I ate at the Bistro one morning for breakfast and the food was good and I enjoyed it very much! I found the hotel employees to be very friendly and helpful if I needed anything.  The lobby is nice and relaxing to just sit in or visit with others and/or have a drink in front of the fireplace. I will definitely be coming back to this hotel in the future!
Manager Response: Texnan,  Thank you for your review! We are glad you enjoyed the Bistro while you were here, as we pride ourselves on the quality of our food and service. We look forward to your visit in the future!

Summary: The lobby is unique.  It has several areas where individuals can sit and talk or where a larger group can gather.  The food (and Starbucks coffee) provided by the restaurant is very good and convenient.  Front desk folks were friendly and helpful.  We requested a room on the top floor away from the elevator and were pleased with the quality of the bedding and the room itself.
Manager Response: Russell,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your previous stay. We also love the layout of our lobby, we find it very inviting for our guests to relax or socialize. Should you return to the area, we hope to see you again!

Summary: This pleasant and well-kept Hotel is perfect for the business traveler ... This is not a five star hotel but it is a strong four-star. It is neat and clean with the friendly staff. Parking in the area is safe and secure. Breakfast is typical and that's fine.  You will have no trouble at this fine hotel.
Manager Response: Dave,  Thank you for reviewing our Hotel. We appreciate you letting others know we're doing a great job. We look forward to your return visit!

Summary: I stayed there for over a week for work.  The room is on the small side but clean and quiet. The bed is very comfortable. The gym room was well equipped with 3 tread mills, 2 bikes and 1 cross trainer and weights. Although I didn't have breakfast there, I noticed that it is served from a counter like in a Starbucks coffee with limited choice which did not attract me at all (plastic cutlery, paper cups etc). The staff on the other hand were extremely helpful and friendly. This hotel is conveniently situated if you have to work in the Lake Forest area.
Manager Response: Christel,   Thank you for review. We appreciate feedback like yours to make improvements to our hotel. We hope your travels bring you back to the area soon.

Summary: The front desk staff was very welcoming!  Every time I came/went I was treated with a warm welcome. Lobby is nicely renovated and cafe was perfect. The only room for improvement were the guest rooms.  They are in need of renovation. The hall was also musty. Location was very convenient to restaurants/shopping/highway.
Manager Response: Hello Longmich,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We have good news, our guest rooms are being remodeled this year!! We are so happy about this and can not wait to have new rooms! We hope your travels bring you back to the area and you get to experience our new rooms as well!

Summary Heading: Not entirely up to Courtyard's standard
Summary: The exterior and the lobby of this hotel looked like a typical Courtyard - but, the rooms were rather bland.  Nothing special about the decor at all.  The furniture was not attractive, and the dresser drawers in my room were all broken. The bathroom was a disappointment, as well - old tub with a hot/cold water mix that was variable/unpredictable.  I was surprised, as most buildings in the area seemed to be new, but this room felt like it was from an older hotel.  On the positive side, the service was good, and the fitness center was well equipped.  Also, the 'free' wifi wasn't quite as slow as at other Courtyard properties.
Manager Response: Hi Arisma,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate you staying with us while you were in the area, and we are sorry for the condition of your guest room, but we have great news! We are getting our rooms completely remodeled this year! We hope that you will join us again in the future and experience how great they turned out!

Summary Heading: Would like to thank entire team
Summary: Stayed here for a trade show and the entire team at this location was TERIFFIC! My apologies as I only have the names of: Yvanna, Shelly, Kevin, Alex, Tracy but my gratitude goes out to all we interacted with during our stay from March 5th thru the 9th, pretty sure it was entire staff at one time or another.   From the very beginning what could have gone wrong did regarding prepping for this show. Our supplies were delivered 2 days prior to our arrival, so many boxes the staff was gracious enough to store our supplies in a conference room …Thank you!  Always being sincerely greeted and asked to let them know if we need anything, regardless of how early we started our day or how late we rolled in was just great. The assistance we received after our perishable supplies were
Manager Response: Mr. Smiteee,   Thank you so much for your review. I definitely remember receiving all those packages here at the hotel, and I am so glad to hear that my team did a fantastic job ensuring they were stored safely until your arrival. I appreciate your words about my staff, as I do agree and think they are amazing as well. We also loved your Goats Milk Ice Cream! Thank you for sharing that! We hope your travels bring you back to the area and we get to see you again soon!

Summary: This is obviously a corporate hotel during the week, we were there at a weekend and the hotel had everything that we needed. The service is great and friendly, the bar/grill serves breakfast (lunch during the week) and dinner food, but nothing that substantial. The coffee is also great, Starbucks! The rooms are spacious and well designed, nothing spectacular but really all you need for a quick weekend or a business trip. The gym is adequate and there is also a small gym. There are some cafes. a starbucks and a bar/grill within very easy walking distance and then a large shopping area/mall a 5 minute drive away.It is off the 241 Toll road which is great if you don't mind paying the tolls.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your feedback about your recent stay, and look forward to your return visit!

Summary: Stayed at the location two nights. Needed two more nights but they were totally booked. Kevin an associate at the front desk went beyond his call of duty to try to help me. Keeping me informed of status of availability and tried to find other accommodations. I had found the whole area was basically booked but somehow Kevin did find a location for me to finish my stay. I was stressed but that was taken away by Kevin and the passion he put into taking care of my problem, greatly appreciated. He is definitely an asset to have on your team and a true team player.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review about Kevin. He is new to our team and we agree, he is a great asset to us. We hope that your travels bring you back to the area soon!

Summary: What distinguishes this hotel is its service. The front desk clerk (Tim) very graciously provided directions on running trails in the area, and I was so impressed by his knowledge and understanding. The clerk in the morning was similarly anticipatory and helpful with small things. Though the property is consistent with the Courtyard brand in almost every respect, the service element really shines. Shows that management is "on it" and "participatory".
Manager Response: Kim,  Your review could not make me more proud of my team. Tim is our newest associate, and seeing him get recognized for a job well done is fantastic! We pride ourselves here at the Foothill Ranch Courtyard on customer service, as we feel we are your family while you are on the road, and we want our hotel to feel like a home away from home. We are thrilled you had a great time while in the area, and we hope you return soon!

Summary: All in all the hotel is pretty nice but unfortunately housekeeping likes to wake people up between 7:30 and 8:30 AM and due to the odd language barrier when you tell them you're sleeping go away they still like to walk inand when you tell the front desk issue they do not take it serious quite sad
Manager Response: Ton,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay. I am sorry that our housekeeping staff came to your room earlier than expected. This is definitely feedback that I will share with my housekeeping and front desk staff. We want all our guests to enjoy their stay with us, whether business or leisure, so we hope that you will choose to stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Always good service but still need to pay attention to small details.
Summary: This is the third time we've stayed at this hotel. Good location, close to a shopping center with several dining choices, a movie theater, Target. The bed was incredibly hard, and we've gotten better rooms the last two stays (this time, we did not have a balcony) but I'm beginning to believe that this has to do more with my Marriott Rewards membership. Seems ever since I started booking with my membership, I've gotten the crappier rooms.   Bonus: I checked both in and out of my room with the Marriott hotel app on my Android phone. Nice!   There was noise above us from about 3am-5am. It may have gone on for longer than that, but I can't be certain. I do know that everytime I would coerce myself back to sleep, I would be awakened by them again. I'm only being partially sarcastic
Manager Response: Kimberly,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay here at the Foothill Ranch Courtyard. Your feedback is very helpful in efforts for my team to grow. Most importantly, I want to reassure you that although all guests are our priority, Marriott Rewards members are our top priority, as we value their loyalty with us. I apologize that you believe you have gotten "crapppier" rooms with your rewards status, as I can guarantee that is not the case.  I would like you to visit us again, and reach out to myself or my team before hand to assure you have a great room while youre with us. Thank you again for your review Kimberly, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great service.  I want to thank the staff and especially Alex Rios for making my business trip a great one. Excellent environment for conducting business in the Irvine area.  I will definitely come back to this hotel and would highly recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Blane,  Thank you for your review about your recent visit to our hotel. We are thrilled that you had such a great experience with us, and glad you enjoyed Alex just as much as we do. We look forward to your returning visits!

Summary: I travel three days a week and for the past several months I've been in the Lake Forest/Foothill Ranch area.   Except for a few times when they've been full, I now stay exclusively at this location.   On those rare  occasions when I do stay at another location in the area, I'm quickly reminded that the service at this property is heads and tails above the rest.   While this is a daily traveler hotel, and service is generally cordial at most Courtyards, Residence Inns, etc, I think Michelle and Alex believe they are working in a JW or Ritz.  Their attitudes, friendly responses and always seeking a way to help, make the service that good.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Ben,  Reviews like yours remind me that I have such a great team. We know you have many options in the area to stay, but we appreciate your loyalty with us. Michelle and Alex are an asset to our team, and I love knowing that they are always there to assist you. We look forward to your many returning visits!

Summary: My husband and 6 year old daughter and I were forced out of our house due to water damage and not happy. But everyone at the hotel was so nice and helpful. They kept asking how things were going with the work and it made our stay much more pleasant! We have been there before for pleasure so we will definitely go back and refer our out of state guests to stay there. Thanks all!  Also the hotel itself was very clean and well kept. Special thanks to Alex Rios for making us smile : )
Manager Response: Thank you for your Super stay review! We are so glad we were able to help you and your family out during an unfortunate time. We hope that your house is back to normal, and that we see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Spent the night to attend a near by holiday party
Summary: What a wonderful hotel! My husband and I booked a room for my company's holiday party, which was about 5 minutes away. We were greeted at the front desk by Tim. He was very professional, friendly, and made us feel welcome. We got ready in our spacious room, and then headed to the bar for a cocktail before the party.  The bartender was very kind and professional. (I don't remember her name) But she had glasses and was extremely friendly.  We lost track of time because we had such a great experience at the bar!!  The next morning, we tried the breakfast options.  Absolutely delicious!!  Entire hotel was a quiet and quaint atmosphere.  We will always choose this hotel every year for our overnight stay for the holiday party.  My only minor complaint, was no hair conditioner was
Manager Response: Vanessa,   Happy New Year! Thank you for your review about your previous stay, we are so happy you had a great time while you were here. We hope that when you return to the area you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: What great service at this hotel!! I checked in at 2pm and had to cut my trip short. I had to check out only 4 hours later at 6pm. Tiffany at front desk waived my hotel room charge and my internet usage charge. I checked out with a 0$ charge!  Thats what I call customer service!  Thank you so much Tiffany!  I'll always stay at the Courtyard Foothill Ranch because of you!
Manager Response: Vikram,  Thank you for your review! I am so happy that my team was able to accomodate your short stay. My team takes pride in making our guest feel comfortable and have a successful stay with us. We hope that you will be back again soon!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, nice lobby, rooms need attention!
Summary: i recently stayed at this property which the staff is very welcoming and the entry amenities look nice, unfortunately that is where it stops. Guest rooms are worn out with uncomfortable beds, sparse creature comforts, basic bathrooms that need attention. I travel on business frequently and Wont return to this location, I will drive further to stay at a location with better attention to detail and creature comforts.
Manager Response: Marty,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am sorry to hear that your stay was less than satisfactory. Our team takes pride in our hotel, and although we are 10 years old, we feel like are guest rooms are comfortable for our frequent business travelers. Good news Marty, We are due for a room renovation in 2015, so our rooms will be brand new again! We do hope that your travels bring you back to our location in the future!

Summary Heading: Good location, friendly staff, not very clean
Summary: The location is good, several restaurants in close walking distance, and the staff is friendly and helpful. The cleaning service is below average though, I have had the same stained sheets on my bed for 3 nights now, and counting.. pretty disgusting.
Manager Response: Mr. Dundee,  Thank you for your review. Following up with your comment about the sheets not being changed, housekeeping changes our guest room sheets every 3rd day a guest is with us, or upon request. Im sorry you have had the same stained sheets, we would be more than happy to change that if it was brought to our attention. We hope you enjoy your stay with us.

Summary: The hotel hallways were freezing all the time but otherwise my stay was amazing. I stayed for 8 days and Alex Depue was an incresible help! He worked the main desk and I felt lile everytime i turned around i had a question, he was there and ready to help! He definitely needs a raise!
Manager Response: Mr. Tyler,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at the Foothill Ranch Courtyard. We are so happy that our staff was able to assist you with everything you needed, in particular Alex Depue. We hope that your travels bring you back to the area soon!

Summary: Spent two weekends here.  Rooms are very nicer do spacious with small fridge.  Front desk folks are very friendly and helpful especially Kaylee.  I would recommend this hotel.  A variety of places to eat in the same parking lot as hotel.  Away from the Orange County madness but very accessible to it.  Only downside is the Starbucks coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We appreciate you taking the time to write about our hotel, and even acknowledge how great Kaylee is. Hopefully your travels bring you back to the area soon!

Summary: I have been staying at this Courtyard for the past two months and have been given the best service by the staff. They greet you each and every time you come and go. The rooms are always very clean. The café food is very good. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in this area.
Manager Response: Spencer,   Thank you for your review! We have definitely enjoyed having you for the past two months, and love that our team is providing such great service to you. We look forward to the many more encounters with you, and thank you for your continued business.

Summary: Great hotel! The hotel rooms are spacious and clean. There is a bar & restaurant on site. The hotel is near the 91 freeway. The customer service here is exceptional! Cailin at the front desk was excellent. She went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and at home. Thanks Cailin! Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your recent stay with us! Cailin is a great part of our team, and we are glad you see that as well! We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: I was immediately greeted by a staff member when I walked in the door. She was very helpful and courteous. I explained that power was out at my home (where I usually work) and asked if I could use a quiet room with Internet access for some business, for just a few short hours. I would gladly pay for a night's stay even though I didn't need the room all night. She asked me to wait a quick minute while she spoke to the manager. The manager was very gracious and let me use on their conference rooms. She gave me the access code for high-speed internet too! I couldn't have asked for a better experience on a bad day. They took care of me and will take care of you.
Manager Response: Michael,  I am so happy to hear that my team was so helpful when you were in a pinch! We love taking care of our guests, but we also love when we can help out people in our community. Thank you for telling our travelers about your great experience with us, it is much appreciated!

Summary Heading: The staff makes you feel like you are royalty!
Summary: I travel 50%+, both internationally and domestically, and this is one of the best hotels ever.  Well, the staff at this hotel is as good as they come, and the hotel is a standard clean Courtyard.  You are greeted by Michelle, Elaine and Yvanna upon arrival with a warm hello and a smile.  If you stay here a few times, you will notice that they remember your name, which is quite nice when you spend more time in a hotel than at home.  The Bistro has decent food given that it is not intended to be a 4-star restaurant but again, the staff makes it top notch.  The morning crew (Alex, Adriana and Kaylie) are friendly, fast and kick your morning off right.  And the evening staff (Alex & Tracy) will help you end your day with a good laugh, a refreshing beverage and a yummy brownie.  I
Manager Response: Tara,  Thank you so much for your review! Our staff takes great pride in making sure our guests feel at home while they are traveling, especially such frequent travelers like yourself! We appreciate you staying with us when you are in the area, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Take it from someone who does a fair amount of traveling... this place is excellent!  When I travel to the area, this hotel is always my first choice.  All of the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful.  On every visit, the front desk people make me feel welcome, and often go beyond the call of duty to ensure all of my travels needs are met.  On my most recent trip, I had a last minute need to travel to a different city; a front desk person went out of his way to assist me in finding a room in that city.  Later upon my departure, the front desk manager even became actively involved in this search.  These are the kinds of experiences that bring people back! Also of note: Great Bistro, nice gym, cozy pool area!
Manager Response: Jeff,  Thank you for your review! Our team strives to help our guests in any way that we can, and I am so happy to see that they went above and beyond for you. We appreciate your continued business, and look forward to your future stays!

Summary: I stay here several times every month .  I am always greeted warmly and treateded with respect and courtesy.  Alex Rios in the Bistro is always attentive, friendly and prompt.  Truly great service and hospitality.  Front Desk crew is always friendly.
Manager Response: Rick,  Thank you for your positive feedback, it is much appreciated! We are so glad that you see how great Alex is as a part of our team, we are very lucky to have him! Our staff strives to make you feel at home while you are traveling, and I hope we do! We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: This is my second stay at this location. Alex and Tracy, in the Bistro have, with their excellent dinner service, helped to make the end of a busy day relaxing and enjoyable. They are both  friendly, prompt and courteous, always. Thank you Alex and Tracy!  These two excellent Courtyard representatives are why I continue to book my Irvine stays at this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review about Alex, Tracy and our Bistro. Alex and Tracy do a great job to make sure our guests have an enjoyable time while they are on the road . Thank you for your continued business, we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Michelle Ponte - front desk & incredible service!!
Summary: There are certain people that can make your stay at a hotel an incredible experience. Even when all is not perfect, a person at that facility will step up and and address those situations to exceed your expectations. That person at the Courtyard at Foothill Ranch, CA is Michelle Ponte! Her smile, cheerfulness, pleasant personality and dedication to making my stay at this facility an extremely enjoyable experience is one of the reasons I continue to stay at this facility when in the area. I will continue to strongly recommend that my Company continue our relationship at the Courtyard in Foothill Ranch. Thank you for Michelle for a job well done!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive words about Michelle. We are so happy Michelle is able to make your stay so enjoyable. We appreciate you staying with us, and will continue to make your stay enjoyable. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, with a few small issues
Summary: We booked this hotel for two nights as a base for a weekend trip to the SoCal beaches and Disneyland. The area was great. Very convenient, with only a 25 minute drive to beaches and theme park. There are lots of places to eat nearby as well, including just about every fast food place you could want, and some chain restaurants. Also close by there is a Ralph's grocery store, a Target and a Walmart. Freeway is close as well but be aware that there are many toll roads.   The hotel itself is very nice, with a neat, modern lobby. Parking is free and plentiful. There is a pool although we didn't have time to use it. There is no complimentary breakfast which is something I usually look for in a hotel stay, but there is a restaurant where you can purchase items. We opted to keep some
Manager Response: Bethanne,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We appreciate the time you took to let other travels know about our Hotel. We sincerely apologize for the fire alarm Sunday morning, and appreciate you and your family understanding the unfortunate incident. We do in fact hope you stay with us the next time you are in the area, so please feel free to reach out to myself should you need to make a future reservation, I would be more than happy to assist you. Thank you again for your review, we hope to see you soon!  Michelle Ponte Front Desk Supervisor  Michelle.ponte@marriott.com

Summary: Everything at the hotel was great but in particular was Michelle Ponte who checked us in. She told me right away her name and that she was there to help us in any way. We got recommendations to two different restaurants and she was right on with both but also asked us the following days how our experiences had been. She really made that extra effort to connect and help and make our experience better. Thank you, Michelle!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive feedback about your recent stay with us. We appreciate your positive words about Michelle. We are so happy you see how great she is, as we value her here at our property. We hope to see you next year when you are in the area again! Until then, take care and see you soon.

Summary: Hotel is clean, modern, staff very helpful. Room sizes are huge, good sized communal meeting space. Breakfast is ok, and there are a number of restaurants in the local area which are good. Nice pool area also!
Manager Response: Liam, Thank you for taking the time to write about your short stay with us. We are so happy you enjoyed your time while you were in the area. We hope that we will see you again sometime soon!

Summary: All staff days and evenings are superb, esp. Alex. I come here on a regular basis due to our corporate office nearby. They provide any assistance with extra mile. I travel a lot and this is one of the best hotels I've been going to (so I keep on coming back).The  very warmth welcome makes a big difference.  This is a special mention for Alex: Toast to you, Alex, for treating a guest like me with a smile and sincere enthusiasm!
Manager Response: Gloria, Thank you for writing such a postitive review about our team memebers! We are so happy that you continuously have a great stay with us. Alex is a great member of our team, and we are so happy you see what an excellent addition to our team he is! We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: We used to live in the area and now return about every two months to spend time with our 3 year old grandson.  He loves staying with us at the "hote towel".  The staff here goes out of their way to treat him like a little rock star.  The front desk and restaurant staff greet him by name coming and going.  He has a toddler crush on Michelle and she squats down to give him hugs and discuss his daily plans with him.  We really appreciate being treated like regulars and recognized.  To make these stays perfect; I wish we could coordinate room service with nap schedules better.  We often stay 10 days at a time and do laundry half way through the stay.  The dryer in the laundry room has been broken the last two visits (May and September).  Its the coin slot; so you would think the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay, and our staff. We appreciate repeat guests like you, and strive to make sure you feel "at home" while you are with us. We would love to make your stay more enjoyable, please let us arrange a cleaning schedule for you the next time you are in the area. We look forward to seeing you all next time! Especially little Jackson!

Summary: Greg, the young man working the evening shift was indispensable in assisting me with the resolution of some difficulties with my credit card.  He was patient, polite, and caring.  He helped me for over 30 minutes in getting things straightened out so that I could get to bed.  He was completely professional and I am extremely grateful for his assistance in resolving the problem.  He would make a great hotel manager some day.
Manager Response: Garth,  Thank you for taking the time to write about Greg. We are so glad he was able to help you out and make your stay great. It's reviews like yours that make our team reassured we are doing a great job. We hope to see you again if you're ever in the area!

Summary: My husband and I were in town for the weekend.  My husband has been searching for a job and needed to fill out an online application.  We did not have our laptop as it was in our home in Colorado.  We needed to attach a resume and drivers license to the application, we had help from Alex Depue.  Alex was so kind and helpful, he went above and beyond, he made sure to attach the resume and my husbands license.  Alex was our guardian angel.    We had a wonderful time, the Hotel was very clean, quiet and relaxing.   The area that the Hotel is in, is beautiful, close to restaurants (there is a great restaurant inside the Hotel, as well), shopping and movie theatres. We were able to visit Saddleback Church too   :)
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review! We are so happy that you and your husband enjoyed your time here with us. Alex is a great new addition to our hotel, and we are so glad you see that also. We hope you enjoyed your fun activities while in the area, and we can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: It was pretty good but... Needed some attention
Summary: I really liked this hotel, the lobby was nice & relaxing. I loved that they had a snack bar & restaurant. It was unfortunate that the food was overpriced ie $10 for a sandwich. The location is fabulous since we could walk down the driveway to the local Starbucks or the some of the tasty restaurants. Our presidential suite was very nice however we had a whole in our shower that had been covered up then began to have mold grow around it. See photo. Then the bathroom did not have a fan to vent out for showering etc. Also the bathroom door lock was broken. This made it tough to have privacy in the bathroom. Lastly, we were not given enough towels for 4 adults traveling. The staff was SUPER WONDERFUL and quickly brought us more towels.     We loved the pool & jacuzzi plus the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We take pride in our hotel and want our guests to love it as much as we do. I will most definitely share your response with our engineer and housekeeping team to ensure we are meeting our guests expectations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay here, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I was a pleasure staying at the courtyard for a short stay while I visited Saddleback Church. When I checked in I was given friendly service and very accommodating suggestions of the area. I was so happy to find that the pool and jacuzzi was open until 11pm!! My morning started with a delicious Starbucks cafe mocha served by the equally delightful Kaylee Reed at Bistro Cafe! French toast and breakfast potatoes are a must..Mmm! I would definitely recommend this hotel and stay here again when I am in Cali!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your previous stay with us here at the Courtyard Marriott Foothill Ranch. We appreciate your kind words about out hotel and especially Kaylee! We love having her on our team, and we are glad you see how great she is too. We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: The front desk clerk is frequently behind the wall which requires a short wait for them to appear.  The staff at the front desk were friendly and helpful.  The lobby Bistro is usually understaffed in the morning.  The only staff at the counter taking orders is also the only person preparing the orders.  It doesn't take long for a line to form during the peak times.  Our room was clean when we arrived and the housekeeper did a good job.  The hotel was quiet.  These comments apply to two separate stays during a ten day period in July/August 2014.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely share it with our team. We hope that you will return to stay with us if you are ever in the area again.

Summary: The hotel itself was great. Well appointed and very clean. But Kaylee at the front desk was phenomenal. Talk about "above and beyond" customer service. She stayed over half an hour past her shift end to help me with a credit card booking. Extremely proffessional and helpful. Kaylee rules!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such positive words about Kaylee, we think she is a great addition to our team also! We hope to see you back when you are in town next!!

Summary: Stayed here for 4 days on a recent business trip to Orange County. It's clean and modern, with nice decor and a friendly feel to it. The bar stayed open until reasonably late, the recently refurbished pool was nice (although I didn't get a chance to use it), and the staff were super friendly. I'd saty here again if I was working in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property, it is much appreciated! We are so happy you had a great experience with us, and we look forward to you returning!

Summary: Great hotel. Business center was well designed and allowed me to print reports and boarding passes - a great help. Compliments go to Greg at the front desk. While checking out, I accidently dropped the keys to my rental car behind the front desk, down a hole through which the cables/wires are run. Greg found a wire hook and spent a great deal of time and effort retrieving the keys. He was a life saver. I'll definitely return. Thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay. We are so happy that Greg was able to help you out and retrieve your car keys. Your positive words will most definitely be relayed to him.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: I started using this Courtyard in 2008. It's always high level service hotel, with polite people and clean. The lobby is brand new and everything is in order. The breakfast, now with Starbucks partnership is really better. I you pass by Irvine area, stop here....you'll be delighted!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review about our hotel! We appreciate that you took the time to write such positive words about us and we look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: This was my first visit to this Courtyard property. It is in a bit of an unusual setting at one end of a small , yet diverse business park right on the edge of suburbia. It turned out to be a great locale with good access to everything nearby. The staff was very helpful in every way. Michelle was a gem at helping me find places I needed to go and the best ways to get there. Upon return, the hotel was very quiet and peaceful. If I am ever in this area again, i will definitely return to the Courtyard.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your time here! Thank you for your kind words about Michelle, we always enjoy when guests recognize what a great team we have! We do hope to see you again in the future! Aloha!

Summary: Carlos was amazing as well as the rest of the staff. I just loved that he remembered me from my last trip and was super friendly and helpful.  Some of the girls even helped me out with a lint roller after I realized my cat decided to sleep on my work shirt before I left:) Tracy is also absolutely wonderful!  My first trip here was for a job interview that I fortunately got selected for.  Tracy and I traded emails before so I could keep her updated on the status of this job. She actually took the time to contact me and ask how it went and was super excited to see me again! Such an awesome experience:)
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such a great review about your stay! We love our team here, and Carlos and Tracy are definitely an assett to the hotel! We wish you well at your new job and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This Courtyard property is a good choice for business travelers and families seeking a location in the south Orange County footprint. It's located in Foothill Ranch right off the CA-241 toll road, which makes access points a breeze.  The rooms are pretty basic Courtyard stock. I had a king bed room and enjoyed the in-room flat screen television which was at least 42 inches in size. Internet access was free, although the property offered a $4.95 per day upgrade in case the speed of the complimentary service wasn't fast enough. I found the complimentary service adequate.  At the back of the property was a pool and hot tub. The hot tub also featured a handicap lift chair for easy access. Nice touch for sure.  My Two Gripes:  First, the hotel elevator was incredibly slow. It wasn't
Manager Response: Dear Atlanta Talkinghead,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay with us and fellow Trip Advisor travelers!  We will definitely share your constructive feedback with our team and hope if you are ever in the area again you might be inclined to come back for a visit!  We appreciate being able to get a bird’s eye view from the guests that stay with us and thank you for writing this review for us.

Summary: Courtyard properties are pretty much universally the same, but this one was a bit of a stand out for the location. It was easy to get to, and there are plenty of stores (Walmart, Target, Ralphs) near by for anything you may need, and several restaurants so you are never hurting for a food choice.  The staff was friendly and accommodating, and I never had any complaints.  The overall area is quiet, which is always a plus. It did seem to have some heavy helicopter traffic near it, but I never heard it while in my room.  Cleanliness was always spotless.  Overall, a good stay for the dollar.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about our hotel. We always love to read that guests had a great time while staying with us.  We hope to have you stay with us again when you are in the area!

Summary: As within the Marriott family of hotels where I've stayed everyone was very pleasant.  This location is easy to find, near many restaurants, and close to the tollway off and on ramps.  Pros: staff, dual pane windows to keep tollway noise to a minimum, parking, very safe location  Cons: room is beginning wear
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Our team strives to make sure everyone feels at home when they stay with us.  We hope that you will choose to stay with us again when you are in the area!

Summary: From the minute I walked into the lobby, I felt the warmth and caring of this staff. A special shout out to Guest Care Supervisor, Carlos Pantoja for going above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable. Circumstances that necessitated a local stay could not have been handled with more concern and my best interests at heart. The lobby was abuzz at almost 10 PM with small groups enjoying glasses of wine and snacks. It was like walking downstairs when your a guest in someone's home and everyone is socializing. My stay had the feel of a Bed & Breakfast. The hotel was very clean, beds extremely comfortable, quiet location yet tollroad close.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such nice words about Carlos and our hotel! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and had a relaxing time. Our team loves to see people in the lobby enjoying themselves, and we are glad you were able to see that also.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great little Marriott for business events!
Summary: My company has been hosting business events at this Marriott for a number of years.  They have always provided great service and made an extra effort to accommodate our guests as much as possible.  There are a number of places within walking distance to eat so it's great for those who Taxi from John Wayne airport and don't have any reliable transportation.
Manager Response: Thank you Christopher G for your great review! We are so pleased that we can provide great service to you and your colleagues while in the area. We look forward to many more visits!

Summary: Location is in a busines complex type of area, not walking distance to many restaurants but I think few mins by car should provide various options.  standard courtyard, starbucks served on site.   One thing I didn't appreciate was the bathroom. The toilet flush handle needed to be pressed and held down for a few seconds for the flush to slowly begin working. IT almost makes you feel for those few seconds that oh boy is this thing broken!  Another thing was the shower water pressure was way too strong. Standard courtyard shower head as always but the pressure was so strong that it actually hurt while showering. Not cool.
Manager Response: Thank you for expressing your concerns about your guest room, I will definitely share your experience with my engineering team and make sure our bathroom and showers are working to guest satisfaction.  We hope that you will choose to stay with us again when you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Stayed for a quick rest on a long drive
Summary: Stayed at this Courtyard on our way to San Diego. Its a halfway point for us. Facilities were nice, but I found it interesting that you needed your key card to enter the front lobby after hours. I've never seen that one before.  Took a minute for the person at the desk to come out from the back and when they did they were a bit on the slow side. It was late, we just wanted to get into our room. Took 10 min to check in, we were the only ones there. This person was polite and helpful, just slow.  So basically, everything was perfect except for the check in experience. My boyfriend and I were sure the desk person was smoking something funny in the back, though.   Oh and this hotel is like more than 5 miles off the freeway. Its kinda out of the way if you're just making a quick stop
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our property has a key lock at the front entrance to provide extra security during the night, we feel like it makes our guests more comfortable knowing only hotel guests are entering the building in the late hours. I will definitely share your experience with my check-in staff and make sure they are present and attentive while working at the front desk.  Thank you for staying with us, and we hope that when you are in the area again you will return.

Summary: I spent three weeks at this property, and it came to feel like home.  From Carlos, and Evelyn at the front desk, to Tracy, Rob, and Alex in the bistro, I was well taken care of, and made to feel like part of an extended family.  I would highly recommend this property for it's staff first and foremost, and a close second would be the comfort of the hotel.  As a constant business traveler, I can honestly say that this hotel ranks high on my list.
Manager Response: We are so glad you felt like you were at home while staying at our property! Our staff strives on making our guest feel comfortable and taken care of. We hope to see you next time you are in the area, and thank you again for staying with us!

Summary: This hotel has excellent service! Stayed here over the weekend and even though they were sold out, they made my family and I feel extremely welcomed the whole time! You can't walk through the halls or lobby area without someone greeting you with a smile! Love that! The pool area was always clean even and the heated pool was great!! I ate at the bistro for breakfast and they have really great breakfast tacos with homeade salsa that is delicious! We will definitely come back in June when we are in town!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Theodore! Our staff strives to make guests feel at home while they are here, and we are glad they were able to make your family feel so welcomed.
